fields.headline: Media Talk podcast: 2012 Quizmas special
fields.bodyText: Joining John Plunkett for this special/obligatory end-of-the-year quiz are two teams: Vicky Frost and Olly Mann versus Maggie Brown and Paul Robinson. Presents will be unwrapped, mystery voices will be revealed and questions will be answered – such as, "how dated does the Media Guardian top 100 look already?" Plus, just to remove any sense of jeopardy from a programme when the questions are mostly incidental to the chaos, we can exclusively reveal that the final result is a tie. You're welcome. Media Talk will be back in 2013. Happy new year!
